PARTNERS.POGGY_DESC: Pogy, a fully customizable bot built with 147 commands, 11 categories, and a dashboard using discord.js@13.

GENERAL.COMMANDS_SUB: Before using any of these commands, you will be greeted with a guide.
GENERAL.COMMANDS_FOOTER: You are experiencing a beta version of this application, which may have some unfinished features!

WEB.MODAL_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to restart the pm2 app process?
WEB.NOTIFICATION_DESC: You are experiencing a beta version of this web application, which may have some unfinished features and may be incompatible with some devices or browsers. Please create an issue ticket on {GitHub}
WEB.DASHBOARD_TEXT: Welcome to the {username} dashboard! Where would you like to go?
WEB.DASHBOARD_FORM_TIPS: Page will reload after clicking the save button.
WEB.PRIVACY_INTRODUCTION_SUB: We respect the privacy of our users and are committed to protecting it by adhering to this policy. This policy describes:
WEB.PRIVACY_INTRODUCTION_SUB2: The types of information we may collect or that you may provide when you install, access or use our Discord application (our 'App').
WEB.PRIVACY_INTRODUCTION_SUB3: Our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting and disclosing that information.
WEB.PRIVACY_WHAT_DATA_WE_COLLECT: Information we collect and how we collect it
WEB.PRIVACY_WHAT_DATA_WE_COLLECT_SUB: We collect various types of information from and about users of our App, including:
WEB.PRIVACY_WHAT_DATA_WE_COLLECT_SUB2: When you interact with our App, we store your Discord User ID and Guild ID. These are unique identifiers provided by Discord and do not contain any personally identifiable information.
WEB.PRIVACY_WHAT_DATA_WE_COLLECT_SUB3: Discord OAuth2 API: We use the Discord OAuth2 API to identify you and retrieve your avatar and username. We do not store this information and only use it to provide functionality within the application.
WEB.PRIVACY_HOW_USE_SUB: We use the information we collect about you or that you provide to us, including any personal information, to:
WEB.PRIVACY_HOW_USE_SUB2: Provide you with the App and it's content.
WEB.PRIVACY_HOW_USE_SUB3: To notify you about changes to our App or any products or services we offer or provide through it.
WEB.PRIVACY_HOW_USE_SUB4: To fulfil any other purpose for which you provide it.
WEB.PRIVACY_DATA_SECURITY_SUB: We have implemented measures designed to protect your personal information from accidental loss and from unauthorised access, use, alteration and disclosure.
WEB.PRIVACY_CHANGES_SUB: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make material changes to the way we treat our users' personal information, we will post the new privacy policy on this page.
WEB.PRIVACY_CONTACT_SUB: If you have any questions or comments about this privacy policy and our privacy practices, please contact us at: {mail}
WEB.TOS_ACCEPTING_SUB: By accessing and using our Discord application (the 'App'), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
WEB.TOS_LICENSE_SUB: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on the Application for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
WEB.TOS_LIMITATIONS_SUB: In no event will we be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on the App.
WEB.TOS_ERRATA_SUB: The materials appearing on the App could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials on the App are accurate, complete, or current.
WEB.TOS_CONTRIBUTION_SUB: The App is an open source project hosted on GitHub. We welcome and appreciate all contributions to the project. Feel free to fork the repository, make changes and submit pull requests.
WEB.TOS_LINKS_SUB: We have not reviewed all of the sites linked to the App and are not responsible for the content of any such linked site.
WEB.TOS_MODIFICATIONS_SUB: We may revise these Terms of Use for the App at any time without notice.
WEB.STATS_TITLE: See online statistics from our application
WEB.HEADER: A multi-purpose Discord client written in Javascript with {commands} commands and a highly optimised web application with control over the application's settings. {bot} is running on over {servers} servers, we invite you to try it out and hope you enjoy it!
WEB.UPTIME_DESC: Always online, with a current uptime of {uptime}. Nearly 99% online application.
WEB.FEATURES_DESC: Improved and new lightweight features with custom UI and different types of actions. Also open source so pull requests are welcome.
WEB.EASY_DESC: All features of the app are open and easy to use. Just give it a try!
WEB.HOW_TO_RANK: How do I rank in levels?
WEB.HOW_TO_RANK_DESC: Well, it's simple! All you have to do is post a message in your favourite community channel and you will receive between 1 and 5 xp per message. You can also get xp with the economy commands, which are fishing, hunting, slots.
WEB.HOW_TO_DASH: How do I use the dashboard?
WEB.HOW_TO_DASH_DESC: First you need to login, just click on the {login} button in the navigation bar. Once logged in you will have full control over your servers and even your profile.
WEB.HOW_TO_SUGGEST: Is it possible to suggest something here?
WEB.HOW_TO_SUGGEST_DESC: Well, I didn't add a suggestion command, but you could use the report bug command, or even better, try making a pull request on {githubRepo}, that will help me!
WEB.IS_IT_OPEN_SOURCE_DESC: Yes, it is! You can now visit {githubRepo} and see that this project is open source under the Apache License 2.0
WEB.WHAT_VERSION: What is the current version of the application?
WEB.WHAT_VERSION_DESC: You are currently running {appName}@{eresVersion}. The current version is still in beta, so many features are still being worked on. You may also find bugs, so if you want to help, please report them.
WEB.WHEN_FINAL: When will the final version be released?
WEB.WHEN_FINAL_DESC: That's the thing, even I don't know. This project is a hobby of mine, so expect random updates, late work and other stuff. This project is only made in my spare time, so the end of it isn't online yet.
